content: I don't mean to seem like I'm getting scared on purpose, I just get startled so easily. When I focus on one thing, I stop noticing things around me.

content: Gran'mama always says, "The Skies Above are watching every action we make." For us farmers, who work off the land and rely on The Skies Above to make a living, we just ask for everything to go smoothly and for bountiful harvests each and every year... But...
